org.opengoss.web.core
接口 IWebPlugin

所有已知实现类：
WebPlugin
public interface IWebPlugin

Web plugins are parts of a web application. One web plugin is a OpenCore plugin (or OSGi bundle) adding web features..

A web plugin when activating will be adding to a web container.

自从：
1.0
版本：
1.0 2006-11-20
作者：
Ery Lee(ery.lee@gmail.com)

方法摘要
 java.lang.ClassLoader getClassLoader()
          OSGi class loader of this plugin.
 org.opengoss.core.IPluginContext getContext()
          Get the wrapped plugin context.
 java.lang.String getContextPath()
          Get the context path of the web plugin.
